item.title: 收购公司围攻雀巢 50 亿欧元水业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，PAI Partners 和贝恩资本是考虑竞购雀巢公司水业务的收购公司之一。【原文：PAI Partners and Bain Capital are among buyout firms considering bids for Nestle SA’s water business, which could be valued at about €5 billion ($5.4 billion) or more in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以安全著称的信号公司也帮助官员逃避审查
item.description: 2025年3月26日星期三，美国华盛顿，国家情报总监图尔西-加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）出席众议院情报委员会听证会。众议院民主党人呼吁国会两党对国防官员通过 "信号 "共享战争计划一事展开调查，并表示他们将继续就这一话题向共和党同事施压，直到他们对泄密事件展开全面调查。摄影师：Tierney L. Cross/BloomTierney L. Cross/Bloomberg【原文：Tulsi Gabbard, director of National Intelligence, arrives for a House Intelligence Committee hearing in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, March 26, 2025. House Democrats are calling for a bipartisan congressional investigation into defense officials sharing war plans over Signal, saying they’ll continue to press their GOP colleagues on this topic until they fully investigate the leak. Photographer: Tierney L. Cross/Bloomberg】

item.title: 阿里巴巴首次推出可处理手机视频和音频的人工智能模型
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了其 "问问"（Qwen）系列中的一款新人工智能模型，该公司称这款模型可以处理文字、图片、音频和视频，其效率足以直接在手机和笔记本电脑上运行。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has released a new artificial intelligence model in its Qwen series that the company says can process text, pictures, audio and video, and is efficient enough to run directly on mobile phones and laptops.】

item.title: 加拿大对乳制品进口征收 300% 关税的实际意义
item.description: 在美国和加拿大之间日益加剧的贸易争端中，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普特别挑出了加拿大对进口乳制品征收的高额关税，称其为 "反美国农民"。理论上，美国牛奶、黄油和奶酪可能面临 200% 至 300% 的关税。实际上，根据加拿大政府的数据，美国出口到加拿大的近 99.9% 的乳制品都是免税进入该国的。尽管如此，特朗普仍要求停止征收高额关税。【原文：In the growing dispute between the US and Canada over trade, US President Donald Trump has singled out for particular complaint steep levies Canada has on the books for imported dairy products, calling them “anti-American farmer.” In theory, US milk, butter and cheese could face duties ranging from 200% to 300%. In practice, close to 99.9% of US dairy exports to Canada enter the country duty-free, according to the Canadian government. Still, Trump has demanded an end to the high tariffs.】

item.title: Insight 拟以 45 亿美元以上的价格出售 PDI 技术公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Insight Partners 正在探讨出售 PDI Technologies 公司，该公司为便利店提供软件。【原文：Insight Partners is exploring a sale of PDI Technologies, which provides software to convenience stores, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据说大众正在酝酿曼能源部门上市等方案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大众汽车公司正在加紧讨论其曼能源解决方案业务的战略替代方案，包括可能的上市。【原文：Volkswagen AG is ramping up discussions around strategic alternatives for its MAN Energy Solutions business, including a potential listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚将在英国裁员约 250 人
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州石油巨头埃克森美孚公司整合其在英国的业务，该公司将在英国裁员约 250 人。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. will shrink its UK headcount by about 250 positions as the Texas oil giant consolidates its operations in the country.】

item.title: 麦迪逊迪尔伯恩为最新基金募资 30 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦迪逊迪尔伯恩合伙公司（Madison Dearborn Partners）正在为其最新基金募集 30 亿美元资金，这将是该私募股权公司自 1999 年以来募集资金规模最小的一次。【原文：Madison Dearborn Partners is seeking $3 billion for its newest fund, marking what would be the smallest pool of capital raised by the private equity firm since 1999, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟要求 Meta 分离市场以解决反垄断问题
item.description: 欧盟在对 Meta Platforms 公司处以 7.98 亿欧元（约合 8.61 亿美元）罚款时，要求该公司为其 Facebook Marketplace 网站创建一个独立版本，或为用户提供访问竞争对手服务的途径，以解决反垄断问题。【原文：The European Union pressed Meta Platforms Inc. to create a separate version of its Facebook Marketplace site or offer users a way to access rival services in order to fix antitrust concerns when it hit the firm with a €798 million ($861 million) fine.】

item.title: 天齐锂业因电池金属长期亏损而扭亏为盈
item.description: 天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp. ）警告说，锂产品价格的波动和日益增长的地缘政治风险可能会给其前景蒙上阴影，因为在电池金属长期下跌的情况下，该公司出现了自2020年以来的首次全年亏损。【原文：Tianqi Lithium Corp. warned volatility in lithium product prices and growing geopolitical risks may cloud its outlook as it swung to its first full-year loss since 2020 amid a prolonged battery-metal rout.】

item.title: 页岩油公司老板在匿名调查中抨击特朗普的关税政策
item.description: 根据达拉斯联邦储备银行最新的能源调查，美国页岩公司的高管们预计，唐纳德-特朗普总统征收25%的钢铁进口关税将导致页岩地区的活动减少。【原文：Executives at US shale companies expect President Donald Trump’s 25% steel import tariffs to lead to lower activity in the shale patch, according to the latest energy survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 摩根大通称量子实验生成了真正的随机数
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has generated and certified so-called truly random numbers using a quantum computer, in a world-first that the bank hopes will have applications for security and trading.】

item.title: Ski-Doo 制造商盈利大增，但关税使前景黯淡
item.description: BRP 公司的盈利超出了分析师的预期，推动该股创下今年以来的最佳盘中表现。【原文：BRP Inc.’s earnings came in ahead of analyst expectations, pushing the stock to its best intraday performance of the year.】

item.title: 塔斯社称俄罗斯拘留了罗斯农业公司的亿万富翁创始人
item.description: 据俄罗斯塔斯社报道，俄罗斯执法机构拘留了俄罗斯最大的农业企业之一 Ros Agro 的亿万富翁创始人瓦迪姆-莫什科维奇（Vadim Moshkovich）。【原文：Russia’s law enforcement agencies detained Vadim Moshkovich, billionaire founder of Ros Agro, one of the nation’s largest agricultural businesses, according to state news agency Tass.】

item.title: 互动经纪商添加与特朗普有关的加密代币
item.description: 在线经纪商互动经纪商集团公司（Interactive Brokers Group Inc.【原文：Online brokerage Interactive Brokers Group Inc. is adding four cryptocurrencies to its trading platform that have been highlighted during President Donald Trump’s embrace of the digital-asset sector.】

item.title: 美国即将加征关税，巴西寻求向墨西哥出口更多猪肉
item.description: 巴西正在向墨西哥施压，要求允许更多肉类加工厂出口猪肉，因为拉美最大的经济体正寻求利用唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战赢得新市场。【原文：Brazil is pressing Mexico to allow pork exports from more meat plants as Latin America’s biggest economy seeks to win new markets by taking advantage of Donald Trump’s trade wars.】

item.title: 埃及计划增加 18% 的支出，着眼于工资和补贴
item.description: 埃及将在下一财政年度把支出增加 18%，部分原因是在这个北非国家摆脱数十年来最严重的经济危机之际，扩大对最弱势群体的支持。【原文：Egypt is set to hike spending by 18% next fiscal year, partly to extend support for the most vulnerable as the North African nation emerges from its worst economic crisis in decades.】

item.title: 在 MTN 协议结束后，FirstRand 将赞助南非春季国家队
item.description: FirstRand Ltd. 旗下的第一国民银行取代 MTN Group Ltd. 成为南非国家橄榄球队（Springboks）的新主赞助商。【原文：FirstRand Ltd.’s First National Bank is the new main sponsor of South Africa’s national rugby teams, known as the Springboks, replacing MTN Group Ltd.】

item.title: TD Cowen称微软放弃更多数据中心项目
item.description: 据 TD Cowen 分析师称，微软公司已经放弃了在美国和欧洲的新数据中心项目，这些项目原计划耗电 2 千兆瓦。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has walked away from new data center projects in the US and Europe that had been set to consume 2 gigawatts of electricity, according to TD Cowen analysts, who attributed the pullback to an oversupply of the clusters of computers that power artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼认为国防和关税是通胀威胁：华尔街日报
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼在接受《华尔街日报》采访时警告说，增加国防开支和美国的贸易政策有可能刺激消费者物价上涨。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann warned that additional defense spending and US trade policy risk stoking consumer prices, according to an interview with the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 美国银行股将创历史最长连胜纪录
item.description: 周三，美国大型银行股指数连续第九天延续涨势，有望创下历史最长连涨纪录。【原文：An index of big US bank stocks extended a rally for the ninth straight day on Wednesday, putting it on track to match the longest winning streak on record.】

item.title: 英国规划改革为增长升级的里夫斯提供了生命线
item.description: 周三，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）意外地获得了经济增长的推动力，因为她的财政监督机构认可了她所承诺的规划改革所带来的积极影响。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves was handed an unexpected growth boost on Wednesday as her fiscal watchdog recognized the positive impact of planning reforms she has promised to deliver.】

item.title: 真正软化的初步迹象
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 莫桑比克经济增长乏力，连续减产创纪录
item.description: 莫桑比克央行连续第八次降息，延续了自2017年推出所谓的Mimo利率以来最长的宽松周期。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank cut rates for an eighth straight meeting, extending its longest unbroken easing cycle since it introduced the so-called Mimo rate in 2017.】

item.title: 肯尼亚借入 4.64 亿美元辛迪加贷款用于征收燃料税
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长约翰-姆巴迪（John Mbadi）表示，肯尼亚已从一个银行财团获得 600 亿先令（约合 4.64 亿美元）的过桥融资，用于结清拖欠公路承包商的未付账单。【原文：Kenya has received 60 billion shillings ($464 million) in bridge financing from a consortium of banks to settle unpaid bills owed to road contractors, according to Treasury Secretary John Mbadi.】

item.title: 垃圾债券赢得了从市场风暴中寻求平静的投资者的青睐
item.description: 垃圾债券似乎不再那么垃圾了。美国投资者正纷纷涌入这一资产类别，近年来，该资产类别已变得更加安全，最近几周还吸引了一些投资者前来寻求避开市场动荡的安全港湾。【原文：Junk bonds don’t seem quite so junky anymore. US investors are piling into an asset class that has grown a little safer in recent years, and in recent weeks has drawn investors seeking a safe harbor from market turbulence.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，近千万学生债务人面临信用风险
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的研究，随着大流行病时期限制不还款后果的措施逐渐消失，近 1,000 万学生贷款借款人的信用评分面临打击。【原文：Almost 10 million student-loan borrowers face a hit to their credit scores as pandemic-era measures to limit the consequences of non-payment fade from the picture, according to research by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: CBO 称美国财政部最快将于 8 月面临支付违约风险
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室警告说，如果立法者不能提高或暂停债务限额，联邦政府最快可能在8月份就会没有足够的资金来按时支付所有账单。【原文：The Congressional Budget Office warned that the federal government could run out of enough money to pay all of its bills on time as soon as August if lawmakers fail to raise or suspend the debt limit.】

item.title: 资产规模达 1 万亿美元后，主动管理在 ETF 中继续存在
item.description: 随着投资者将资金投入新一代策略，美国主动型交易所交易基金（ETF）持有的总资产已达到 1 万亿美元的里程碑；这打破了这一蓬勃发展的资金管理领域的被动声誉。【原文：Total assets held by actively run ETFs in the US have hit the $1 trillion milestone, as investors sink cash into a new generation of strategies — shaking up the passive reputation of this booming corner of money management.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司有望因努力争取特朗普青睐而实现广告销售增长
item.description: 根据研究公司 Emarketer — 的数据，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司自这位亿万富翁于 2022 年收购该公司以来，有望在第一年实现广告收入增长；部分原因是广告商对马斯克在唐纳德-特朗普政府中的影响力做出了反应。【原文：Elon Musk’s X is on pace for its first year of advertising revenue growth since the billionaire acquired the company in 2022, according to research firm Emarketer — in part because advertisers are reacting to Musk’s power in the Donald Trump administration.】
